title: Payments
name: CardsandPayments
brandDescription: Explore and use our APIs to build, test, certify, and deploy solutions pre-integrated to our market-leading account processing platforms.

subcategories.name: deposits
subcategories.description: APIs that make it possible to create, modify or retrieve records for deposit accounts and transactions

subcategories.name: loans
subcategories.description: APIs that make it possible to create, modify or retrieve records for loan accounts and transactions

subcategories.name: bankServicing
subcategories.description: APIs that support account processing functions in the back office, branch and call center

subcategories.name: cashManagement
subcategories.description: APIs for managing cash flow and moving money between accounts for business or large retail customers

subcategories.name: riskAndPerformance
subcategories.description: APIs that support compliance, fraud mitigation and insights into financial performance

subcategories.name: treasury
subcategories.description: APIs for treasury products used to manage and forecast working capital of mid-market and corporate clients

product.description: Use the APIs in this domain to create or integrate applications that deliver frictionless money movement through novel channels.
product.longDescription:
Use the APIs in this domain to create or integrate applications that deliver frictionless money movement through novel channels.
  • Credits and debits
  • Transfers
  • Connections to payments networks
